narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: DHHS IHS Phoenix Area is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Whiteriver, AZ. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $91.0M in Medicaid payments across 193K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $91.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
